mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T2_LEISURE_TBL L INNER JOIN T2_CODE_TYPE C ON C.C_KIND = L.LEISURE_KIND INNER JOIN T2_CODE_TYPE C2 ON C2.C_KIND = C.C_TYPE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) L_CNT, PRODUCT_NO, STATE FROM T2_PACKAGE_REQUEST_TBL WHERE PRODUCT_KIND = 'LEISURE' GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO ) P ON P.PRODUCT_NO = L.LEISURE_NO WHERE L_DELYN = 'N' AND U_ID = #{uId} ORDER BY L.LEISURE_NO DESC LIMIT #{startNum}, #{lastNum}
SELECT * FROM T2_LEISURE_TBL L INNER JOIN T2_CODE_TYPE C ON L.LEISURE_KIND = C.C_KIND INNER JOIN T2_CODE_TYPE C2 ON C2.C_KIND = C.C_TYPE WHERE L.LEISURE_NO = #{leisureNo} AND L_DELYN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE T2_LEISURE_TBL SET L_DELYN = 'Y' WHERE LEISURE_NO = #{leisureNo}
UPDATE T2_LEISURE_IMG_TBL SET IMG_DELYN = 'Y' WHERE LEISURE_NO = #{leisureNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T2_PACKAGE_REQUEST_TBL WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{leisureNo} AND PRODUCT_KIND = 'LEISURE'
mapper.update: UPDATE T2_LEISURE_TBL SET LEISURE_NAME = #{leisureName}, LEISURE_KIND = #{leisureKind}, LEISURE_PRICE = #{leisurePrice}, LEISURE_SALES = #{leisureSales}, L_ZIPNO = #{lZipno}, L_ADDR = #{lAddr}, L_DETAIL_ADDR = #{lDetailAddr}, L_UPDATE_TIME = now(), L_RESIDUE = #{lResidue} WHERE LEISURE_NO = #{leisureNo}
UPDATE T2_LEISURE_IMG_TBL SET IMG_NAME = #{imgName}, IMG_SAVE_NAME = #{imgSaveName}, IMG_PATH = #{imgPath}, IMG_DATE = now() WHERE IMG_NO = #{imgNo}
